First the code,first3-ig-van-01january2016-barchart.R

```ruby library(ggplot2) data3 = read.csv( file=”01january2016-1st3datapoints.csv”, stringsAsFactors=F) p = ggplot(data=data3, aes(x=colour, fill=I(colour) ), ) p= p + geom_bar(stat=”count”)

ggsave(“1st3-ig-van-01january-2016-barchart.png”, p, width = 26.666666667, height = 26.666666667, dpi = 72, limitsize = FALSE) ```

Then the data, 01january2016-1st3datapoints.csv:

csv colour,id,dayofweek-month-dayofmonth,daynumber #8B7D7D,1152722080165873450_545005592,FriJan1,1 #4C3F3F,1152722094194289757_285178194,FriJan1,1 #716666,1152722146880749719_340863,FriJan1,1
